attributes.action: Impose a ban on alcohol consumption within parks, whilst on the street or any other place that does not suit the gathering of drunks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It's about time that we get our streets and public spaces back. There are places for drinkers, these are called Pubs/clubs/restaurants etc or within their own home. So enjoy a tipple there.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
